channel.title: How do you change item prices?
channel.description: im tring 2 fighure out how 2 change the price of my items can u please tell me how.

item.title: How do you change item prices?
item.dc:creator: @andrisovas andrisovas
item.description:
@andrisovas wrote:

Hello … It’s easy First you need to open Item.cfg and then edit like this… :
item = 4151 Abyssal_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 1000000 4000000 4000000 0 102 0 0 0 0 0 0
Item - write item id…
abbysal whip-is name…
A_weapon_from_the_abyss-exmine info… JUST EDIT THEESE 1000000 1000000 1000000 -edit just first theese…or you can edit all :D… but dont edit numbers who got more than 3 ratings…

Il hope ive helped you and i get rep

See you later

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change item prices?
